username.name: Uzantnomo
username.text: 5 ĝis 32 signoj, komencante per 4 signoj por NFT uzantonomoj

bio.name: Biografio
bio.text: up to 70 characters; for Premium users - up to 140 characters

channels_and_chats_number.name: Numero de kanaloj kaj supergrupoj
channels_and_chats_number.text: up to 500 (including ones you own); for Premium users - up to 1000

gifs_number.name: Nombro de konservitaj GIF
gifs_number.text: up to 200; for Premium users - up to 400

accounts_number.name: Nombro de kontoj
accounts_number.text: up to 3; for Premium users - up to 4-6 (depends on app)

visible_messages.name: Nombro da videblaj mesaĝoj
visible_messages.hint: (kundividita limo inter privataj babilejoj, bots kaj malnovaj grupoj)
visible_messages.text: unlimited; before 2018 year - up to 1,000,000 visible messages: see https://twitter.com/telegram/status/1060910769410371584

participants_number.name: Partoprenantoj
participants_number.text: up to 200,000 but unlimited in Broadcast Groups

pinned_number.name: Fiksitaj babilejoj en la ĉeflisto
pinned_number.text: up to 5 chats or channels + 5 secret chats; for Premium users - up to 10 chats or channels

group_name.name: Nomo kaj priskribo de la grupo

editing.name: Redakti mesaĝon
editing.text: in 48 hours after sending; unlimited in Saved and for admins with pinning rights

mentions_amount.name: Numero de mencioj
mentions_amount.text: up to 50, else notifications won't be sent

participants_to_see_stats.name: Number of members to see statistics

username_reservation.name: Username change reservation
username_reservation.hint: (time before username will be available for everyone, not just the original owner)

broadcast_group_access.name: Converting a supergroup to broadcast group

read_receipts_availability.name: Read receipts availability
read_receipts_availability.text: for chats with 100 members or less, the list of users is only available for the user who sent the message

read_receipts_lifetime.name: Read receipts lifetime
read_receipts_lifetime.text: up to 7 days since message was sent

video_chat_viewers.name: Video broadcast viewers
video_chat_viewers.text: officially it's stated to be unlimited, in practice, the stream becomes unstable at about 2,000 simultaneous viewers

channel_name.name: Nomo kaj priskribo de la kanalo

channel_admins.name: Kvanto da administrantoj en kanalo
channel_admins.hint: (including bots; you can add a bot to your channel only by making it an admin)

editing.name: Mesaĝredaktado
editing.text: unlimited (if the channel has a discussion group linked, posts older than 2 weeks won't be updated in the chat)

visible_participants.name: Videblaj abonantoj
visible_participants.hint: por la administranto de la kanalo

channel_deletion.name: Forigo de kanalo
channel_deletion.text: channels with more than 1K subscribers can be deleted only with Telegram support

followers_to_see_stats.name: Number of subscribers to see statistics

username_reservation.name: Username change reservation
username_reservation.hint: (time before username will be available for everyone, not just the original owner)

media_descriptions.name: Media captions
media_descriptions.text: up to 1024 characters; for Premium users - up to 2048 characters

upload_size.name: File size limit
upload_size.text: up to 2 GB; for Premium users - up to 4 GB

file_name_length.name: Longeco de la dosiernomo
file_name_length.text: up to 60 characters, others will be trimmed out

album_size.name: Images and videos in single message

folder_amount.name: Kvanto da dosierujoj
folder_amount.text: up to 10 folders; for Premium users - up to 30 folders

pinned_chats_in_folder.name: Pinned chats in a folder
pinned_chats_in_folder.text: up to 100 chats; for Premium users - up to 200 chats

messaging_frequency_broadcast.name: Message broadcasting frequency
messaging_frequency_broadcast.hint: only applies when actively sending notifications to otherwise inactive chats
messaging_frequency_broadcast.text: up to 30 messages per second across chats

messaging_frequency.name: Message sending frequency
messaging_frequency.text: up to roughly one message per second, except maybe short bursts

messaging_frequency_groups.name: Message sending frequency
messaging_frequency_groups.text: up to 20 messages per second in the same chat

bot_command_description_length.name: Longeco de la komandpriskribo
bot_command_description_length.text: up to 256 characters, must be non-empty when set via Bot API

favorite_stickers.name: Favorite stickers number
favorite_stickers.text: up to 5 items; for Premium users - up to 10 items

pack_size.name: Stickers in a pack number
pack_size.text: up to 120 for static, up to 50 for animated

sticker_size.name: Pezo de glumarko
sticker_size.text: one side equal to 512px, the other side 512px or less; strictly 512x512 for animated

file_size.name: Dosiera pezo de la glumarko
file_size.text: up to 512 KB for static, up to 64 KB for animated

photo_resolution.name: Fotokvalito
photo_resolution.text: each side should be less or equal to 1280px, else it will be downscaled so the biggest side will be 1280px
